name: Deandra Roper
text: So I’ll just start by stating I haven’t had Pizza Hut in almost a year due to me being unhappy with the product, however that was in AZ and on our way to VA (from N.C.) to go visit family we stopped at this location. Food was great, service …More

name: Christina ME
text: Pizza was great. I guess with curbside just be more aware of customers at the curb. Thanks

name: John Hipps
text: Great staff. Good food

name: jason t
text: Great Pizza with Excellent Service. Highly Recommended.

name: Adrienne Ragsdale
text: It's okay I don't go there really

name: Sasha Kravtsov
text: So I’ll just start by stating I haven’t had Pizza Hu

name: Jennifer Price
text: The food was good, and the young man that waited on me and my family was amazing!

name: Bruce Lynch
text: Good food, good prices, quick service  & very good server. We ordered pasta & wings  , very good.  Very enjoyable experience.

name: Just me
text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT THIS WAS LITERALLY THE BEST PIZZA HUT I'VE EVER BEEN TO YES THE PLACE IS A LITTLE OUTDATED BUT IT'S VERY CLEAN INSIDE WITH FRIENDLY EMPLOYEES. …More

name: Jason O'Bannon
text: Great food and service.  The girls did a great job and they are very friendly!  I will be back!

name: Sunshine Hardison
text: Pizza Hut is always a hit around work. $10 Dinner Box is the best deal around with plenty to share. Get the garlic crust and you can't go wrong. This is at least once a week lunch for our office.

name: Truth Hurts
text: Pizza was always good from the past when you eat in....only 4 stars cause they need to update the inside

name: Wayne Cline
text: Called and was told that they were closed 6:30 on Sunday July 19

name: Shauna R
text: Didn't disappoint.  This location has been in operation for years.   My waiiter was friendly and the pizza was good.

name: ashly and doug murphy
text: I ordered a double order of breadsticks, and when I got them home there was no dipping sauces. They were also uncut and my pizza was hardly cut.

name: Scott Rogers
text: Pizza was good. Blows my mind that a brand owned by Pepsi  and well known...could get in this condition. This dump needs a re-model!

name: Michael Bryant
text: Really nice Pizza Hut and really the people that work there make it that way. Food is good also

name: Janet Austin
text: Decent food, cheesesticks didnt taste fresh at all

name: Scott DeFord
text: Never eat here !!! Horrible buffet.  Shoulda listened to my common sense.  Knew better, but tried it. Nasty

name: Jack Croach
text: Ok we tried the buffet, it was slow to be restock, it was hot when it was.

name: rose williams
text: Love the super supreme pizza good food at good prices

name: Joshua Carroll
text: It was not as bad as others have said, about your average pizza hut. It has gotten better since the other reviews for this place. One of the Drivers, Dustin, was quick and nice about our order and got to us at a reasonable time.

name: Angela Boyce
text: Messed up our order. My sons spaghetti was hard as a rock. Service was fine.. pizza was fine. Waiter blamed mess up on the people in the back. Left no tip. Bad experience.  Btw the ac was being serviced, hot as blazes .

name: Pat Price
text: Wings on Wednesdays, great hotwings and delicious garlic parmesan wings

name: D
text: Pizza is great. Was done relatively quickly too

name: Shelley Morgan
text: Fairly Timely, Love Redeeming points! Quaility is alot better!

name: Cathy W
text: 1st pizza gas wrong toppings and 2nd one was cold.

name: Benjamin Holmes
text: My pizza was hot and fresh and it had plenty of toppings on it!

name: A. L. A
text: This is an original Pizza Hut, with the old lamps and booths, transports me back into being a kid. It's busy with carry out orders but the associates are always quick to assist.

name: Melissa vandyke
text: I like the service the people are nice and give you the info. You ask without being rude.

name: Maxine Hayes
text: The food was really fresh and hot and the waitress was pleasant

name: Medina Hickman
text: Food was hot & good!

name: Derek Sprouse
text: Nasty pizza a 5 year old could of done better

name: Central VA Horse Rescue
text: Went for the lunch buffet. They never have but one kind of pizza plus cheese on a thin crust. If you don't like veggies or jalopenas, you are put of luck.

name: Ashley Currin
text: South Hill pizza hut is so good.. It hits the spot!

name: Luisa Orellana
text: Place is dirty and bad customer service

name: Jenipher Singleton
text: Very unorganized. Scheduled two daycare to eat at the same time. If one called before the other you could've suggested the other group wait another hour or so if they still wanted to eat there that day. The restaurant was too small for two large groups.

name: Hope Nelson
text: Great Food!

name: SunnySummer
text: Li aka love it

name: Kim Conner
text: We received the wrong order. Bugs were crawling on the table. It was worse than a Truck Stop.

name: Timm Morris
text: A local favorite. I enjoy their pizza.

name: Dan Thompson
text: Friendly staff, had our to go order ready when we arrived

name: Margaret Miller
text: The cashier was really nice and the pizza and bread sticks were really good.

name: Faith Newton
text: Nice buffet and the waitress was very attentive

name: Danella Davis
text: Good food but special aren't all that.

name: Duane Satter
text: Great place friendly employees

name: Danielle Baskerville
text: Can't go wrong with the pizza!

name: James Reed
text: Pizza was hot and tasty.

name: Daniel Wilson
text: Always good.

name: Bernice Revis
text: They was very outstanding

name: Mary Clavell
text: Very displeased with the online ordering. They were 25+ mins late and we didn't receive our entire order. I will not order again from South Hill, VA Pizza Hut, knowing how when we called about our order they didn't care or do anything about it! Very disappointed, and I'm not a picky or impatient person!

name: La-Toya King
text: Great service

name: Chris Andrews
text: I used to work there so I know a lot what they do and how they operate  there stingy with there cheese,  I came here last week spent almost twenty five bucks and there was hardly any cheese on the pizza I even threw one of them out, if any tips for this business start giving people what they pay for ..

name: morgan robinson
text: They aren't that great anymore

name: Jay Johnson
text: Your typical classic Pizza Hut.  The lunch buffet is M-F from 11:30 to 1:30.

text: Great pizza

text: Good food.

text: Sat down was handed menu took drink order and never took meal order waited half-hour got up to leave before waited on and there was a bad oder
